Reviews.Title: No bueno...
Reviews.Author: Amazonian
Reviews.Content: Bought this lens to replace the 6mm lens that came with one of our Night Owl cameras. It's easy to screw in at first, but then gets very difficult. The barrel ended up being too short, so by the time it was screwed in far enough to barely start being able to get any kind of picture, the glass inside had already started cracking. As my wife, who was inside monitoring the picture on the TV, kept saying a little bit more, the glass cracked into a million pieces at both ends. Then we had a hell of a time getting it out because it was screwed in so tight, and ended up damaging the ccd on the camera itself in the process, and now have to replace it. A $6 piece of junk now caused us to have to spend another $99 on a new four pack of cameras. It was either that or replace the cameras at $39.99 a pop. God, I hate theives...

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: oracleken
Reviews.Content: Not expensive and it is easy to install. it gives me a wilder view of my camera. Works as expected.I personal think it is a Good deal.

Reviews.Title: Good lens
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: The lens performs as advertised.  Thus far, I have no complaints.  I would recommend it as a good, wide-angle, replacement lens.
